metadata.title: CVE-2020-24979 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: none. Reason:This candidate was withdrawn by its CNA. Further investigation showed thatit was not a security issue. Notes: none.

criterions.comment: bison: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
